import React from 'react'; import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import './Slider.scss' import App from '../App'; const ImageSlider =(props)=> { let settings = { adaptiveheight: true, dots: true, autoplay: true, draggable: true, infinite: true, speed: 1000, slidesToShow: 9, slidesToScroll: 1, cssEase: "linear" } me = (props) => { let i; for(i=0; i<11, i++; ){

{props.name} {props.children[i]}

} } return ( {this.me} {/*

{props.name} {props.children[0]}

{props.name} {props.children[1]}

{props.name} {props.children[2]}

{props.name} {props.children[3]}

{props.name} {props.children[4]}

{props.name} {props.children[5]}

{props.name} {props.children[6]}

{props.name} {props.children[7]}

{props.name} {props.children[8]}

{props.name} {props.children[9]}

*/} ) } export default ImageSlider
